name: get_quotes_by_specific_category
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool world_of_quotes.
Tool description: API returns over 50,000+ famous quotes from over 10,000+ great authors and over 350+ different categories.
API description: This API returns the collection of quotes by category you pass in the query params. Maximum you can get 20 quotes at a time and can be customized by *limit*. Our API support pagination and records can be paginated by *page* query param.

category.description: The category of quotes to fetch.

page.description: The page number for pagination. Defaults to 2.

limit.description: The maximum number of quotes to fetch per page. Defaults to 20.
